He is very patient and approachable.Explains the cause of problem in a very positive way and suggest less medicines and i have seen relief in one day.He takes times for checking reports and gives such a way of treatments for a patient required.i suggest my family friends and everyone.

This was the first visit. He spent enough time with the patient knowing all the details and not in a hurry. He did not straight away mention scanning or MR. Instead with all the inputs, he explained what it could be and how much time that would take and suggested blood test. The next day he checked the reports and named few medicines. We need to go after 15 days again. Will update once again after that.

My father was suffering with severe spine pain. The doctor educated us with the issue and explained the choices. I opted for the surgery (Laminectomy with fusion). After which the recovery was immediate (just in couple of days). My father is very much relieved of pain, now. Thanks to the doctor, I suggest this doctors for spine cases to everyone.
He is very friendly and polite and he is receiving patients very friendly and good person I suggest my friends

review: Visited Dr arvind on friends referral whom he operated on 2 yrs back for back and doing well me had back problem visited 2 doctors from yashoda and care both advised surgery and went to sir for third opinion sir gave option of epidural steroid before surgery and got it done the same day at his clinic ot after 2hrs doctor made me walk and pain in my leg came down drastically felt like magic kudos to this doc will rate him best for spine

review:
**** ** ********* ****** *** *** ** ******** ** ***** *** ***** *** ***** **** ** **** ***** **** **** My sincere request do not ever visit to this doctor.
 . We had a terrible experience here and we stopped visiting after the first consultation itself.

I was suffering from Neck pain, when I was asleep, from 1 month. I visited doctor and he leisurely listened my problem. He then make me understand the cause for the problem and informed about the seriousness if ignored. He then started treatment based on the results of calcium test and vitamin deficiency tests. 
Within 2 weeks, I was free from my problems. Thanks a lot to the doctor.
This feedback is provided so as to help others to quickly identify good doctor around their locality.
Very good conversation. Asks about each and every symptom clearly. Explains each and everything. Diagnosis was very good. No unnecessary medicines or tests.
